userGuide.title: This is how it works
userGuide.description: Findbox offers a simple solution to gain control over your storage.

stepOne.title: Create Account
stepOne.description: Start by creating an account. It's easy, and you'll immediately get access to all the features in the app.

stepTwo.title: Add a Unit
stepTwo.description: Add a place where your items will be organized, such as the attic, storage room, basement, or garage. This helps you keep track of where your boxes are located.

stepThree.title: Create a Box
stepThree.description: Create a box to start organizing your things. Each box can represent a specific category or area for easier management.

stepFour.title: Add Items to the Box
stepFour.description: Add the items you want to store in the box. This way, you'll have full control over what's in each box and where it's placed.

about.title: About Fyndbox
about.welcomeText:
Welcome to Fyndbox – your smart solution for organizing and tracking your belongings! 
 Fyndbox is the app that helps you easily sort, catalog, and keep track of all your items, whether they’re in the attic, storage room, garage, or basement. With Fyndbox, you’ll save time searching and get a clear overview of where everything is with just a few taps.
about.addUnitText: Start by creating a location for your items, such as the attic, garage, or storage room. By organizing your locations, you’ll have a structured view of where each box is stored and better control over where your things are kept.
about.createBoxText: Set up boxes representing different categories, areas, or themes. Each box can be named according to its contents, making it easy to keep everything organized in a way that makes sense to you.
about.addItemText: Add the items you want to store in each box. This gives you a clear overview of exactly what’s in each box, so nothing is forgotten or overlooked.
about.printQRcodeTitle: Print a QR Code for Your Box
about.printQRcodeText: Fyndbox allows you to save or print a QR code for each box. Attach the QR code to the box, and you can easily scan it to see the contents right in the app – perfect for quickly finding what you’re looking for.
about.withFyndboxText: With Fyndbox, you’ll enjoy a comprehensive and organized storage system for all your belongings. Organize smarter and locate your items faster – all in one app.
about.contactUsText: Feel free to contact us at info@fyndbox.com if you have any questions or need support!
